outline:
1. to yearn, be kindled, be black (hot), grow warm and tender, be or grow hot, become hot, become emotionally agitated
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to grow warm and tender
      2. to be or grow hot
strongs_def: properly, to intertwine or contract, i.e. (by implication) to shrivel (as with heat); figuratively, to be deeply affected with passion (love or pity)
